title: Power Cut : 3-hours & 20 minutes daily from 28th to 30th April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board announced that power cuts of 3 hours & 20 minutes will be imposed from the 28th to the 30th of April daily.
Power Cut : 3-hours & 20 minutes daily from 28th to 30th April
#Rambukkana Shooting: Court orders to arrest SSP who ordered to open fire, & cops who followed the order
